samples.context: The mechanic knows that if he replaces the spark plugs, then if he changes the engine oil, the car will run smoothly.
samples.question: The mechanic changed the engine oil. The car did not run smoothly. Did the mechanic replace the spark plugs?

samples.context: In the kingdom, there is a legend that if the king rules with wisdom and justice, then if the weather is favorable, the harvest will be bountiful and the kingdom will prosper.
samples.question: The weather was favorable. The harvest was poor and the kingdom did not prosper. Did the king rule with wisdom and justice?

samples.context: The general understands that if he develops an ingenious battle strategy, then if his troops are well-trained and disciplined, they will win the war.
samples.question: The general's troops were well-trained and disciplined. They did not win the war. Did the general develop an ingenious battle strategy?

samples.context: In a bakery, the baker knows that if she uses premium ingredients, then if she follows the recipe precisely, the cake will taste delicious.
samples.question: The baker followed the recipe precisely. The cake did not taste delicious. Did the baker use premium ingredients?

samples.context: The teacher knows that if she creates an engaging lesson plan, then if she delivers it enthusiastically, the students will be interested and participate actively.
samples.question: The teacher delivered the lesson enthusiastically. The students were not interested or active. Did the teacher create an engaging lesson plan?

samples.context: The gardener understands that if he prepares the soil properly, then if he waters the plants diligently, the vegetables will grow big and healthy.
samples.question: The gardener watered the plants diligently. The vegetables did not grow big and healthy. Did the gardener prepare the soil properly?

samples.context: The pilot understands that if he performs the pre-flight checklist properly, then if the weather is favorable, the flight will be smooth and on-time.
samples.question: The weather was favorable but the flight was delayed and turbulent. Did the pilot perform the pre-flight checklist properly?

samples.context: The gardener is aware that if she plants her seeds at the correct depth, then if she waters them sufficiently, the vegetable plants will thrive.
samples.question: The gardener watered the plants sufficiently, but the vegetable plants did not thrive. Did the gardener plant the seeds at the correct depth?

samples.context: In the bakery, the head baker knows that if she uses high-quality flour, then if she kneads the dough thoroughly, the bread will rise perfectly and have an airy texture.
samples.question: The head baker kneaded the dough thoroughly, but the bread did not rise perfectly. Did the head baker use high-quality flour?

samples.context: The mechanic told John that if he uses the recommended high-quality motor oil, then if he changes it regularly at 5000 miles, his car engine will stay in good running condition.
samples.question: John changed the oil regularly at 5000 miles. His car engine developed problems. Did John use the recommended high-quality motor oil?

samples.context: Sophia's grandma taught her that if she uses fresh picked tomatoes, then if she simmers the sauce slowly, her pasta sauce will taste delicious.
samples.question: Sophia simmered the sauce slowly. But the sauce did not taste delicious. Did Sophia use fresh picked tomatoes?

samples.context: The coach mentioned that if the team trains hard and keeps fit, then if they play with full commitment, they will win the championship.
samples.question: The team played with full commitment. But they did not win the championship. Did the team train hard and keep fit?

samples.context: The painter was aware that if he primes the wall, then if he applies two coats of paint, the finish will be smooth and even.
samples.question: The painter applied two coats of paint. The finish was not smooth and even. Did the painter prime the wall?

samples.context: The teacher mentioned that if students complete all the homework assignments, then if they study hard before the test, they will score high marks.
samples.question: The students studied hard before the test. The students did not score high marks. Did the students complete all the homework assignments?

samples.context: In manufacturing, engineers know that if they optimize the production process, then if workers are properly trained, the factory will operate efficiently.
samples.question: The workers were properly trained. The factory did not operate efficiently. Was the production process optimized?
